snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include a look at how easy it is to create a fake person on the Web, hackers using reports of bad news to spread bad...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include a look at how easy it is to create a fake person on the Web, hackers using reports of bad news to spread bad software and a criticism of an amateur manhunt on Reddit in the Boston bombings.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Kickstarter Jr. and Google in Utah
